moreBlocks.articles:
• Patients' Rights and Doctors' Wrongs - Secrets to a Safer Pregnancy and Childbirth
    Patients' Rights and Doctors' Wrongs enables expectant mothers to take an informed, proactive role in their obstetrical care so they can obtain quality services. Using real stories, the authors provide indispensable information and advice.
  • Navigating a Medical Malpractice Lawsuit
    Navigating a Medical Malpractice Lawsuit is the ultimate resource for anyone who has been victimized by medical practice. This easy to read and understand book explains how to bring and successfully resolve a medical malpractice case.

description:
JJS Justice: Practicing Law with Excellence and Compassion

Why Hire Us

JJS Justice has uncovered the truth and won over three billion dollars in verdicts and settlements for clients across a wide range of serious, complex, and high profile cases. Our team of trial attorneys has a proven track record of taking on tough cases involving some of the nation's largest and most powerful organizations - and winning...
